page.title: grandcar 2023
page.description: This commercial was shot in a detective style to attract the clients' attention and captivate them with the atmosphere. Thus, we wanted to kill two birds with one stone: to tell about the advantages of the company and to increase the depth of viewing through an unusual presentation.  The partner was satisfied, we hope you are too!

page.title: Up with us
page.description: We manage the Instagram of Everest, a professional volleyball club in Astana. Our approach to content is aimed at teenagers: we create posts with anime, Challenges and coaches, engaging young people in sports and volleyball. We help the club to inspire a new generation of athletes.
